summary: Completed frontend testing of DOWN dating app for Black queer men in London. Landing page, navigation, and signup wizard working well with luxe gold/black theme. Minor API issues found but core functionality intact.

api_errors.issue: Returns 502 status code - NextAuth session endpoint failing
api_errors.impact: Console errors but doesn't affect core app functionality

api_errors.issue: Returns 406 status code when attempting login
api_errors.impact: Login functionality may not work properly

integration_issues.issue: Unable to complete full Supabase integration test - form resets to step 1

passed_tests: Landing page loads with correct luxe gold/black theme
DOWN logo and branding elements present
Navigation links (Log In, Apply Now) work correctly
Feature cards display properly (Rotating Cohorts, Concentrated Windows, etc.)
Signup page navigation from landing page works
4-step signup wizard progression works (Account → Profile → About You → Review)
All form fields accept input correctly
Form validation works (password matching, age verification)
Step progress indicators show completion status
Login page loads with proper form elements
All form elements have proper data-testid attributes for testing
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix NextAuth API route errors (502 on /api/auth/session) and investigate login submission 406 error. Test complete Supabase integration for signup/login flows to ensure database operations work properly.
